body_html: @jrabary In fact，estimator use training.CheckpointSaverHook to save model and load model if there is model in model dir and it can be seen in estimator.py. These hooks inherit form session run hook class. Writing you own hooks that inherit form session run hook can help you realize you own function such as changing some layers variable or optimizer

body: @jrabary  In fact，estimator use training.CheckpointSaverHook to save model and load model if there is model in model dir and it can be seen in estimator.py. These hooks inherit form session run hook class. Writing you own hooks that inherit form session run hook  can help you realize you own function such as changing some layers variable or optimizer
